official-title.#text:
To amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit
		  Control Act of 1985 to provide the President with the authority to exempt
		  civilian Department of Defense personnel accounts from
		  sequestration.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 255(f) of the
			 Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985/s:255/ss:f

header.#text:
Optional exemption of
			 civilian Department of Defense personnel who have served in the uniform
			 services

header-in-text.#text: and certain civilian personnel of the

text.#text:
in the side
			 heading by inserting before the period at the end

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: by adding at the end the following new sentence:

may also,
			 with respect to civilian employees of the

who served in
			 the Armed Forces on or after August 2, 2011, exempt that portion of the
			 personnel account covering them from sequestration or provide for a lower
			 uniform percentage reduction than would otherwise apply.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2614 IH: To amend the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to provide the President with the authority to exempt civilian Department of Defense personnel accounts from sequestration.
